CustomField.formula:
IF(ISNULL(ClosedDate), ROUND(10 * ( (5 * FLOOR((TODAY() - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(TODAY() - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD(NOW() - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c)) >= 13, PreSourceTimestamp__c, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c)) + " " + '13:00:00' )) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1 ))) )) ), 0),
ROUND(10 * ( (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(ClosedDate) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD(ClosedDate - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1))) )) - (5 * FLOOR((DATEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01)) / 7) + MIN(5, MOD(DATEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c) - DATE(1996, 01, 01), 7) + MIN(1, 24 / 10 * (MOD( IF(HOUR(TIMEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c)) >= 13, PreSourceTimestamp__c, DATETIMEVALUE( TEXT(DATEVALUE(PreSourceTimestamp__c)) + " " + '13:00:00' )) - DATETIMEVALUE('1996-01-01 13:00:00'), 1 ))) )) ), 0) )
CustomField.label: Time in Pre-Source (Business Hours)
